comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content:
This appears to be SS Delius in dry dock after being damaged by one of the first "smart bombs" employed in warfare, the Henschel Hs 293.  The Hs 293 was a rocket propelled and radio controlled glide bomb employed from Luftwaffe bombers for anti-shipping operations.

SS Delius was damaged by an Hs 293 in the Atlantic in 1943.  I suspect this photo captures Delius undergoing repairs after this attack.

Here's another photo of the ship in the collection:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/biblarte/5260665964/in/photostream/]
